reviewText:
Not only does this tape include the legendary short Stolen Jools -- which boasts dozens of stars including Laurel And Hardy, Wallace Beery, Edward G. Robinson, Irene Dunne, Gary Cooper, Loretta Young, etc. -- but two other shorts starring Bob Hope and Bing Crosby are also included.
But wait ! There's More !
Two of the best episodes of the Jack Benny Program are offered here as well, one guest-starring Humphrey Bogart, the other Bob Hope, with a cameo appearance by Jerry Lewis AND Dean Martin.
